game.characters

Class SkeletonCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • city.cs.engine.Walker
          • game.characters.SkeletonCharacter

  • public class SkeletonCharacter
extends city.cs.engine.Walker
    Class for Skeletons, enemy mob that will appear throughout the game.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean facingRight
      Boolean that checks whether this body is facing right or not.
